transcript: if you have any measure of success in your life which everyone does you just have to change what you're measuring on you were able to have all of that failure and still have a level of success which in some ways I think is like a little bit of a sense of humor you can be like wow I'm such a dunce like I can't believe I did all these things I can't believe I'm still here and I think what it does is rather than talk about all your accomplishments and set yourself up for a big ego failure basically sit from the exact opposite which is like I can't even believe I'm here what a win
